title: 8base
description:
8base provides a set of tools that revolutionizes the software development lifecycle from ideation to production: 
*Archie, AI Product Architect* transforms your software idea into actionable software requirements, specifications, designs and architectural plans in minutes.
*Backend-as-a-Service (BaaS)* offers an instantly-available Serverless GraphQL Backend that powers everything you need to build and run professional-grade web and mobile applications.
